entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: Professor Slughorn is a potions master who is giving a prize to the student who makes the best potion. He says 'Well, by turning to page ten of Advanced Potion-Making'.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the students in Professor Slughorn's class. He sees Malfoy riffling through his copy of Advanced Potion-Making.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is a student in Professor Slughorn's class who really wants to win the lucky day. Harry sees him feverishly going through his book.

relationships.description: Professor Slughorn assigns a task to Harry, which is to make the best potion from page ten of Advanced Potion-Making.
Malfoy competes with other students for Professor Slughorn's reward, which is a lucky day.
